thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-IQ Power Licensing H1 Loss After Tax Widens To 1.1 Mln CHF

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IQ Power Licensing H1 Loss After Tax Widens To 1.1 Mln CHF
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - IQ POWER LICENSING AG:
* H1 NET SALES FOR FIRST HALF YEAR 2017 241,000 CHF * H1 LOSS AFTER TAX 1.1 MLN CHF VS LOSS AFTER TAX 1.0 MLN CHF YR AGO
* SALES AND PROFITABILITY WILL IMPROVE SIGNIFICANTLY IN THE SECOND HALF OF 2017
* SEES POSITIVE TREND WILL CONTINUE IN 2018 Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
